childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
I was born near Barcelona (Spain 🇪🇸) in 1989, living in a [charming beach town](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canet_de_Mar) for 27 years until [my wife](https://www.instagram.com/lauradiaz_ca) and I decided in 2016 to experience Canada 🇨🇦 and its mountains. Although having to move back, we were so convinced that we returned to [Calgary](https://calgary.ctvnews.ca/calgary-ranked-fifth-most-livable-city-in-the-world-1.4577157) once more a year later, where we still reside 📍.

I am focused on Web Development 🌐, which started managing and designing [WordPress](https://wordpress.org/) sites and evolved into developing web applications with [JavaScript](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/javascript) and [React](https://reactjs.org/) ⚛️.

I keep looking for new technologies, lately learning about AI and Machine Learning 🤖.
